summary: Comprehensive testing of Job Keywords (Cargos) feature completed. All backend APIs working correctly (16/16 tests passed). Frontend UI fully functional with all CRUD operations verified. Fixed a critical bug in PUT /priorities endpoint where route order caused 422 errors.
passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/job-keywords/classify-contact returns Mateo for no match
Frontend: Stats cards show Total Keywords, Buyer Personas, Priority Levels
Frontend: Buyer Persona Priority panel with 9 draggable items
Frontend: Keywords List with search and filter functionality
Frontend: Filter by Buyer Persona works
Frontend: Add Keyword dialog opens and creates keyword
Frontend: Bulk Add dialog opens with textarea
Frontend: Reclassify All dialog shows confirmation
Frontend: Delete buttons visible and functional
updated_files: /app/backend/routers/job_keywords.py - Fixed route order: moved /priorities routes BEFORE /{keyword_id} routes to prevent path conflicts. Changed PUT /priorities to use Request.json() for accepting raw array body.
/app/backend/tests/test_job_keywords.py - Created comprehensive test suite for Job Keywords APIs
seed_data_creation: 9 keywords already exist in database (5 for Jorge, 4 for Martha). Test data created and cleaned up during testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Job Keywords (Cargos) page at /foundations/who?tab=cargos. Features: keyword CRUD, bulk add, buyer persona priority drag-and-drop, contact classification, reclassify all contacts. All APIs require authentication. The PUT /priorities endpoint accepts a raw JSON array (not wrapped in object).

bug_fixed.root_cause: FastAPI route order issue - /{keyword_id} route was matching 'priorities' as a keyword_id before the /priorities route could match. Also, Pydantic v2 requires explicit Body(...) for accepting raw list bodies.
bug_fixed.fix_applied: 1) Moved /priorities routes BEFORE /{keyword_id} routes in the router file. 2) Changed endpoint to use Request.json() to accept raw array body.
bug_fixed.verification: All 16 backend tests pass, frontend drag-and-drop priority reordering works

features: View all keywords with search and filter
